title: UFC on ESPN 6 weigh-ins faceoff video: Yair Rodriguez vs. Jeremy Stephens
text:
BOSTON – UFC on ESPN 6 ceremonial fighter weigh-ins took place Thursday, and MMA Junkie was on the scene at the Orpheum Theatre.

In the co-main event, Yair Rodriguez meets Jeremy Stephens in a featherweight bout with bad blood after the debacle that was their 15-second no contest last month at UFC Mexico City.

You can watch their faceoff in the video above, and check out our photo gallery below.

Gallery Photos: UFC on ESPN 6 ceremonial weigh-ins view 39 images

UFC on ESPN 6 takes place Friday at TD Garden and airs entirely on ESPN2.
description: Watch the final faceoff between UFC Boston co-headliners Yair Rodriguez and Jeremy Stephens.
